events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for a software developer role.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to manage your candidacy and will be in touch soon.
Your initial screening interview was conducted to understand your software engineering skills and experience.
We are pleased to receive your prompt response confirming availability for the next stages of the software engineer recruitment process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our lead developer for next Tuesday at 10 AM UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
Your HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your career goals and company culture fit next Thursday afternoon.
The HR interview concluded positively, with mutual interest expressed in moving forward with an offer.
We have extended an employment offer to you for the software engineer role, including details on compensation and benefits.
You provided positive feedback and accepted the terms outlined in the offer for the engineering position.
You formally accepted the employment offer, confirming your start date and enthusiasm for joining our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun, including setup of development tools, introduction to the engineering team, and initial training.
The hiring process for the software engineer position is now complete, and you are officially welcomed as part of the engineering department.
